tidbits.title: Digital Pioneers
tidbits.description: Estonia is a global leader in digital innovation, known for its e-government initiatives, digital ID cards, and being one of the most digitally advanced societies.

tidbits.title: Medieval Old Towns
tidbits.description: The country boasts well-preserved medieval old towns, particularly in Tallinn, offering cobblestone streets, historic architecture, and a vibrant cultural scene.

tidbits.title: Nature Lover's Paradise
tidbits.description: Estonia's diverse landscapes include dense forests, picturesque islands, and bogs, attracting nature enthusiasts and providing ample opportunities for outdoor activities.
